text: Earl Blumenauer (; born August 16, 1948) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for , from 1996 to 2025. He is a member of the Democratic Party. The district includes most of Portland. In November 2020, Blumenauer was named a candidate for U.S. Secretary of Transportation in the incoming Biden Administration. Pete Buttigieg was eventually chosen instead. On October 30, 2023, Blumenauer announced he would not run for re-election in 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Earl Blumenauer official U.S. House website * * * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Oregon Category:Politicians from Portland, Oregon Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Earl Blumenauer
